properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
42 FOOT S/V SILVER GIRL, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS
ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO LOST RUDDER,
PREPARING TO ABANDON SHIP IN 27-40-01S 007-25-33E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO CAPE TOWN RADIO,
E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA.
